entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Should we consider adding a "Date/Time/Number format data is wrong" bug category? #96101
  • `TraceUtils.CopyStringDictionary()` is broken #96092
  • High memory consumption of .Net 6 app on Linux #96091
  • Publish 9.0 version of Microsoft.Private.Intellisense package #96084
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] rationalize #includes in the native runtime #96081

Closed

  • Why does System.Text.Json throw an exception when deserializing polymorphic types in case $type is not the first property #96088
  • TypeLoadException when attempting to create an instance of a struct of particular type #84999
    Future
  • Assertion failed '(fgEntryBB->bbRefs == 1) && (fgEntryBB->bbPreds == nullptr)' #96038
  • Is there a document for Coreclr on the Android platform #90160
  • Clean up dependencies on 8.0 packages. #92502
    9.0.0
  • Failures in x86 coreclr pgostress #95887
  • Assertion failed: 'emitJumpCrossHotColdBoundary(srcOffs, dstOffs) == false' #95946
    9.0.0
  • [mono][tests] System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests attempting to JIT compile method #96041
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAot: Remove never-defined FEATURE_RWX_MEMORY #96100
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rename IsOSXLike to IsApplePlatform in libraries #96098
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Rename IsMacOS to IsApplePlatform in the JIT #96090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update the bit field of encoding function names #96082
    arch-arm64-sve
  • Add dumpers for new loop data structures #96080
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix passing of valuetypes with a non-8 byte aligned size on arm64+ios/macos. #96079
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix potential NREs in ConfigurationBindingGenerator #96078
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • extract side-effects from op1 of GT_COMMA #96077
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [RISC-V] Add branch label names to disasm #96057
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Change Native AOT ThreadBuffer.m_threadId to OS thread id #96075
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove references to 8.0.0-rc.1 packages #96085
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Bump StyleCop.Analyzers to latest version #96086
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove Android from UnsupportedOSPlatforms in System.IO.Ports #96087
    area-System.IO.Ports
  • Remove unused OSVERSIONINFO from pal.h #96089
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix hot/cold splitting #96074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disallow reuse of PInvoke transition frame by marshalling helper calls #96047
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Refactored GCToEEInterface and RedhawkGCInterface implementations into separate files. #95991
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix the decoding of some runtime invoke wrappers. #96072
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Updated

  • [wasm] Extract `src/mono/browser` from `src/mono/wasm` #95940
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement KMAC #96025
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] introduce JSProxyContext #95959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • ReadAsStream/CopyTo should reset result/destination stream position #95827
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_ALWAYS fall-through check in Compiler::fgFindInsertPoint #96070
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [aot][browser] Stop throwing in CultureInfo getter #95910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CX_4A group #95918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser][fix] maxParallelDownloads #95870
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Fix crash when processing aliases that do not point at names #96048
    area-System.Text.Json, source-generator
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [RISC-V] Simplify codegen for div/mod #96068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
